data.current_description: Returns an array of Task objects
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all tasks with optional filtering
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated collection of Task objects. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination through query parameters. Returns a TasksCollection containing an array of Task objects with metadata and navigation links. Requires authentication.

AI agents need to understand filtering options and response format to use this effectively.

data.current_description: Returns a Task object
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific task by ID

message: Operation 'updateTask' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, missing_context. Summary is adequate and action-oriented. Description is too minimal and lacks critical details about partial update support, what gets returned, side effects (timestamp updates), required ID parameter, and error handling. data.current_description: Updates a Task object
data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing Task object identified by its ID. Supports partial updates - only provided fields in the request body will be modified. Returns the updated Task object with all current properties. Modifies the task's state and updates its modification timestamp. Requires authentication and the task must exist (returns 404 if not found).
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate and action-oriented. Description is too minimal and lacks critical details about partial update support, what gets returned, side effects (timestamp updates), required ID parameter, and error handling. AI agents need to understand that this is a partial update operation and what state changes occur.

message: Operation 'refreshSource' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, vague_summary, missing_context, missing_side_effects. Both summary and description lack clarity about what 'refresh' means operationally. AI agents need to understand this is a full synchronization operation, that it's asynchronous, and what data gets updated as a side effect. The distinction from incremental refresh is important.

data.current_description: Refresh a source object
data.summary_suggestion: Trigger full refresh of Source data
data.description_suggestion: Triggers a full refresh of the specified Source, synchronizing all data from the source system into the inventory. Requires the Source ID as a path parameter. This operation initiates an asynchronous refresh process that updates all associated resources and their metadata. Returns the updated Source object with refresh status. Side effects include updating all dependent service instances and inventory data.
data.reasoning: Both summary and description lack clarity about what 'refresh' means operationally. AI agents need to understand this is a full synchronization operation, that it's asynchronous, and what data gets updated as a side effect. The distinction from incremental refresh is important.

message: Operation 'incrementalRefreshSource' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, vague_summary, missing_context, missing_side_effects. Both summary and description lack clarity about the incremental nature and its benefits. AI agents need to understand this is a partial synchronization operation that only updates changed data, how it differs from full refresh, and what side effects occur. The operational distinction is critical for agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Incremental Refresh a source object
data.summary_suggestion: Trigger incremental refresh of Source data
data.description_suggestion: Triggers an incremental refresh of the specified Source, synchronizing only changed or new data from the source system into the inventory. Requires the Source ID as a path parameter. This operation initiates an asynchronous incremental sync that updates only modified resources and their metadata, reducing processing overhead compared to full refresh. Returns the updated Source object with refresh status. Side effects include updating only affected service instances and inventory data.
data.reasoning: Both summary and description lack clarity about the incremental nature and its benefits. AI agents need to understand this is a partial synchronization operation that only updates changed data, how it differs from full refresh, and what side effects occur. The operational distinction is critical for agent decision-making.
